name: MYC_MESG_SEX_BCP
description: This table contains patient answers to the "birth control methods" question submitted in a history questionnaire.

columns.name: MESSAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the message record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SEX_QUESN_BTHCR_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's response to the sexual activity birth control methods question.

columns.name: SEX_QUESN_BTHCR_IDX
columns.description: The birth control methods question index item.
